title: Getty Images Plunges Into the Generative AI Pool
description: Stock-photo giant Getty Images has partnered with Nvidia to build an image generator. Just like with other tools of its ilk, questions remain about who should get credit for the pictures it dreams up.

title: FBI Agents Are Using Face Recognition Without Proper Training
description: The FBI makes heavy use of face recognition services like that of controversial startup Clearview AI, but 95 percent of the agents using them haven’t completed training on the technology.

title: The Booking.com Decision Shows the True Scope of the EU’s Big Tech Crackdown
description: European competition authorities have blocked an acquisition by Dutch travel company Booking as scrutiny on Big Tech companies heats up.

title: The ChatGPT App Can Now Talk to You—and Look Into Your Life
description: ChatGPT inches closer to feature parity with the seductive AI assistant from Her, thanks to an upgrade that adds voice and image recognition to the chatbot.

title: Your Boss’s Spyware Could Train AI to Replace You
description: Corporations are using software to monitor employees on a large scale. Some experts fear the data these tools collect could be used to automate people out of their jobs.
